title: Digital Game-Based Playful English Education Program

context.prior_knowledge: Proficiency in basic English reading comprehension and grammar knowledge
context.additional_context: Game-based collaborative learning in smartphone-enabled classroom environments

learning_goals: Learners can understand and utilize situational dialogues appearing in digital games with 80% accuracy.
Learners can apply 50 vocabulary items learned through game missions at a level usable in actual job interviews.
Learners can achieve a top 70% weekly ranking by demonstrating teamwork with peers on a mobile quiz game platform.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
